recipes.label: Inspecting: Bundle of notes
recipes.description: A note comes attached to the package, adressed to the courier. It reads: no names, under any circumstances.

recipes.label: Inspecting: Ivory Box
recipes.description: This package has travelled a lot. Looking at the stamps on it, it already went to several places in this sea alone : I can see Amsterdam, and Copenhagen.
